contest-event.event-date:
June 14, 1946 D Bottom Mossley (Whit Friday)
Bottom Mossley (Whit Friday) 0 March Contest Whit Friday Tameside bottom-mossley-whit-friday
Contest ran 1884-1955.
Mossley Result as shown in Alec Greenhalgh book 'Hail Smiling Morn', however Brass Band News July 1946 has result as - 1 Lockwood, 2 Brighouse, 3 Black Dyke. Also has Eric Ball conducting Brighouse but then has F.Berry as the conductor of Brighouse at Stalybridge on same night.
Feb. 15, 2017, 11:42 a.m. March 22, 2021, 8:05 a.m.
1 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Fred Braithwaite
2 Black Dyke Band Arthur Oakes Pearce
3 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Eric Ball
4 City of Manchester Unknown
